title: Component Creation and JSX Practice
description: Create several React components using JSX and demonstrate their use in a simple application. Focus on component structure, props, and rendering.

title: State Management and Hooks Assignment
description: Implement state management in a React app using useState and useEffect hooks. Explain the flow of data and component reactivity.

title: Deploying a React Application Project
description: Build a complete React application and deploy it to a cloud platform. Include a README with deployment steps and a demo link.

title: Stealth Movement Skills Assessment
description: Demonstrate your ability to move silently and unseen through a series of obstacles. Assessment will be based on agility and stealth.

title: Ninja Tools and Weapons Quiz
description: Quiz on the identification, safe handling, and strategic use of traditional ninja tools and weapons.

title: Ninja Techniques Demonstration
description: Perform a live demonstration of advanced ninja techniques, including acrobatics and weapon skills.

title: Argumentation and Logic Written Assignment
description: Write an essay analyzing the structure of arguments and logical fallacies in debate. Provide real-world examples.

title: Bowl Debate Strategies Quiz
description: Quiz on effective strategies and techniques unique to bowl debate competitions.

title: Endurance Debate
description: Participate in a multi-day bowl debate competition. Grading based on stamina, argument quality, and teamwork.

title: Coral Reef Ecosystem Research Report
description: Write a research report on the structure and importance of coral reef ecosystems. Include diagrams and references.

title: Excavation Techniques Practical Quiz
description: Quiz on safe and effective coral reef excavation methods, including equipment and safety protocols.

title: Industry Skills Final Exam
description: Comprehensive exam covering all skills and knowledge required for a career in coral reef excavation.

title: Whisking Techniques Lab
description: Hands-on lab to practice basic and advanced whisking techniques. Submit a video demonstration.

title: Advanced Whisking Methods Task
description: Complete a set of advanced whisking challenges, including the Bulgarian and alternate hand whisk.

title: Culinary Discipline Essay
description: Write an essay on the importance of discipline and etiquette in a professional kitchen.

title: Nerd History and Culture Project
description: Research and present on a significant event or figure in nerd history and its cultural impact.

title: Advanced Geekery Analysis
description: Analyze a complex topic in science, math, or pop culture and present your findings in a creative format.

title: Nerd Olympics: Team Challenge
description: Compete in a series of nerd-themed team challenges. Points awarded for creativity, teamwork, and knowledge.

title: Introduction to Hyperbolic Spaces Assignment
description: Complete exercises introducing the concepts of hyperbolic geometry and its applications.

title: Knitting in Higher Dimensions Quiz
description: Quiz on techniques and theory behind knitting in non-Euclidean and higher-dimensional spaces.

title: Existential Knitting Exam
description: Final exam covering the philosophical and practical aspects of hyperbolic knitting.
